summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2012 WINNEBAGO JOURNEY RV. WHILE MERGING ONTO THE HIGHWAY, THE BRAKES MALFUNCTIONED. THE CONTACT DEPRESSED THE BRAKE PEDAL DOWN TO THE FLOORBOARD AND THE RV WAS FINALLY ABLE TO STOP. THE RV WAS TOWED TO BOB BELL FORD (7125 RITCHIE HWY, GLEN BURNIE, MD 21061, (410) 766-3600) BECAUSE THE RV HAD A FORD CHASSIS. THE DEALER CALLED THE CONTACT AND STATED THAT ALL OF THE BRAKE LINES WERE RUSTED OUT FROM THE FRONT TO THE REAR. THE WINNEBAGO MANUFACTURER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 17,383.
